proposal.personalizedPitch:
Aldrin, I've been working with similar companies and noticed ROYAL HORIZON IMPORT AND EXPORT LTD has several development opportunities that could help with growth.

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer specializing in e-commerce solutions. I work with companies in import & export to solve technical challenges through custom development.

I spotted several areas where custom development could help:

1. Import/export business could benefit from inventory management and tracking systems
2. International trade operations could be streamlined with custom logistics software
3. E-commerce functionality needed - no shopping cart detected

Recent relevant projects:
• DAstore - Complete e-commerce platform with 140+ products and payment processing
• Full MERN stack development (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)
• Cloud deployment and authentication systems

Should I put together a quick overview for your team?

Best regards,
